statements: SELECT * FROM bus_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM bus_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT route_name, estimated_duration_minutes FROM bus_routes WHERE distance_km > 50 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bus_routes WHERE end_location = 'City B' AND estimated_duration_minutes < 60;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM bus_routes WHERE estimated_duration_minutes BETWEEN 30 AND 90 ORDER BY estimated_duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM bus_routes WHERE distance_km > 20 ORDER BY route_name ASC
SELECT * FROM bus_routes WHERE estimated_duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM bus_routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, estimated_duration_minutes FROM bus_routes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY route_id ASC
SELECT route_name, distance_km, estimated_duration_minutes FROM bus_routes WHERE start_location = 'City Center' ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM BusRoutes;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time, day_of_week FROM BusSchedule;
SELECT end_location, start_location, route_name FROM BusRoutes;
SELECT * FROM BusSchedule WHERE day_of_week='Monday';
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_id > 3;
SELECT route_id, MAX(departure_time) AS latest_departure FROM BusSchedule GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes ORDER BY start_location ASC, end_location DESC;
SELECT route_name, day_of_week FROM BusRoutes INNER JOIN BusSchedule ON BusRoutes.route_id = BusSchedule.route_id WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM bus_stops;
SELECT stop_id, stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM bus_stops WHERE stop_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT route_name, frequency, start_time, end_time FROM bus_routes WHERE frequency >= 5 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, stop_id, departure_time FROM bus_schedule WHERE departure_time > '08:00:00';

SELECT route_name, stop_name, departure_time FROM bus_routes JOIN bus_schedule ON bus_routes.route_id = bus_schedule.route_id JOIN bus_stops ON bus_schedule.stop_id = bus_stops.stop_id WHERE route_name = 'Route 1';
SELECT * FROM bus_stops;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM bus_stops WHERE stop_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, frequency FROM bus_routes WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY route_name DESC;

SELECT bs.stop_name, br.route_name, bs.latitude, bs.longitude FROM bus_stops bs JOIN bus_schedule sch ON bs.stop_id = sch.stop_id JOIN bus_routes br ON sch.route_id = br.route_id WHERE sch.departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '10:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM bus_routes;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM bus_stops WHERE location LIKE '%Station%';
SELECT bus_id, bus_number, capacity FROM buses ORDER BY capacity DESC, bus_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_name = 'Express Route';
SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS total_stops FROM routes JOIN bus_schedule ON routes.route_id = bus_schedule.route_id GROUP BY route_name;
SELECT bus_number, capacity FROM buses WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY bus_number DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM bus_schedule WHERE stop_id = (SELECT stop_id FROM bus_stops WHERE stop_name = 'Central Station');
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM BusRoutes WHERE bus_id = 1;
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_long FROM BusStops ORDER BY stop_id DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Passengers WHERE email LIKE 'johndo%' ORDER BY passenger_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, bus_id, stop_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM BusSchedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time;
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM BusStops WHERE stop_name = 'Central Station';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM BusRoutes WHERE start_location = 'City Center' AND end_location = 'Suburbia';
SELECT bs.stop_name, bs.location_lat, bs.location_long, bt.ticket_price FROM BusStops bs JOIN TicketSales bt ON bs.stop_id = bt.schedule_id;
SELECT ps.first_name, ps.last_name, ps.email, bs.ticket_price FROM Passengers ps JOIN TicketSales bs ON ps.passenger_id = bs.passenger_id ORDER BY bs.ticket_price DESC;
